item.title: Please Help me adding Donator Points ! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Add this in player class

Add this in playersave

} else if (token.equals("DonorPoints")) { p.DonorPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and

characterfile.write("DonorPoints = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.DonorPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.DonorPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Now go to shophandler

search for a shopId and copy/paste the entire shop if statement and just replace with a new Id and with the proper points type.

make sure to do the same thing under

and finally… go to

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) { in shophandler still

and you can add the case (for the item id) and then the return ( for the point total )

the shopid will be based from the shops.cfg and make sure to add a firstclicknpc action for the npc to open the shop

Read full topic
